title: Author Correction: Fetal hepatocytes protect the HSPC genome via fetuin-A
author: Xiao-Lin Guo
excerpt: Nature - Author Correction: Fetal hepatocytes protect the HSPC genome via fetuin-A
text: Author Correction Open access Published: 18 February 2025 Yi-Ding Wang1 na1, Yan-Jun Liu  ORCID: orcid.org/0000-0001-9383-94191 na1, Lei Chu2, Hua Zhu3, Ye Hu1, Ren-Yan Wu1, Hong-Yu Xie1, Juan Yu4, Shui-Ping Li1, Chao-Yang Xiong4, Ruo-Yan Li  ORCID: orcid.org/0000-0001-5337-97295, Fang Ke1, Lei Chen6, Guo-Qiang Chen  ORCID: orcid.org/0000-0003-4936-23631,7,8, Liang Chen9, Fan Bai  ORCID: orcid.org/0000-0001-6119-89365, Tariq Enver  ORCID: orcid.org/0000-0002-0866-644310, Guo-Hong Li  ORCID: orcid.org/0000-0003-2137-07834, Huai-Fang Li2 & …Deng-Li Hong  ORCID: orcid.org/0000-0001-5251-02971,7,11,12  Nature (2025)Cite this article Subjects Correction to: Nature https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-024-08307-x Published online 4 December 2024In the version of this article initially published, the first name of Chao-Yang Xiong was misspelled (Zhao-Yang); the Fig. 1d labels E12.5 PL, E12.5 FL, E13.5 FL, E14.5FL, E15.5 FL, E16.5 FL and E18.5 FL were missing, as was the Fig. 1m x-axis label “Time after ENU injection (days)” and y-axis label “Disease free (%)”; and the Fig. 4f. x-axis label “log2(fold change)” was preceded by a negative sign. The author’s name and the figures have been amended in the HTML and PDF versions of the article. Nature (2025)Cite this article

Subjects

Correction to: Nature https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-024-08307-x Published online 4 December 2024

In the version of this article initially published, the first name of Chao-Yang Xiong was misspelled (Zhao-Yang); the Fig. 1d labels E12.5 PL, E12.5 FL, E13.5 FL, E14.5FL, E15.5 FL, E16.5 FL and E18.5 FL were missing, as was the Fig. 1m x-axis label “Time after ENU injection (days)” and y-axis label “Disease free (%)”; and the Fig. 4f. x-axis label “log2(fold change)” was preceded by a negative sign. The author’s name and the figures have been amended in the HTML and PDF versions of the article.
